db.createTableOneQuery: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS file1 (Longitude float,Latitude float,forecastTime varchar,Temperature float,Precipitation float);
db.createTableTwoQuery: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS file2 (Longitude float,Latitude float,forecastTime varchar,Temperature float,Precipitation float);
db.createTableThreeQuery: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS file3 (Longitude float,Latitude float,forecastTime varchar,Temperature float,Precipitation float);

app.weatherDataFileOneQuery: SELECT forecastTime,Temperature,Precipitation from file1 WHERE Longitude=$1 and Latitude=$2
app.weatherDataFileTwoQuery: SELECT forecastTime,Temperature,Precipitation from file2 WHERE Longitude=$1 and Latitude=$2
app.weatherDataFileThreeQuery: SELECT forecastTime,Temperature,Precipitation from file3 WHERE Longitude=$1 and Latitude=$2
